_sText:
Here's a second in a possible series of "smooth" maps I've made. Only a few sharp corners and nice neon lighting to finish off the smooth, clean visual effect I like in my gungame maps. Since the last one was blue, I wanted to go with a different color, but warm colors seemed to make the map a little more hostile, while the green was a nice medium color with a little edge to it.

There are buyzones. Gungame turns them off, I believe. If not, I guess you can buy stuff.

In the next version there will be monster truck sounds. Maybe.
